The confirmation from the San Diego Poli: s Office that Payton's death was not being treated as suspicious.
The report from Payton: s friend, Morgan Murtaugh, who found her unconscious and called 911, confirming the suddenness of her death.
The statement from Payton: s family, specifically her mother Cindy, explaining that her death was the result of complications from the H1N1 flu virus and meningitis.
The verification of Burkman: s statement about Payton's work, confirming that she did report on the resetting of government cellphones belonging to Peter Strzok and Lisa Page.
